title: Environmental Quality
description: Temperature, humidity and CO₂ daily trends by apartment

panels.title: Apt 1 — Daily Average Temperature (°C)
panels.query: SELECT date, avg_temperature FROM fact_environment_daily WHERE apt_id = 'apt1' ORDER BY date

panels.title: Apt 2 — Daily Average Temperature (°C)
panels.query: SELECT date, avg_temperature FROM fact_environment_daily WHERE apt_id = 'apt2' ORDER BY date

panels.title: Daily Average Humidity (%)
panels.query: SELECT date, apt_id, avg_humidity FROM fact_environment_daily ORDER BY date

panels.title: Daily Average CO₂ (ppm)
panels.query: SELECT date, apt_id, avg_co2_ppm FROM fact_environment_daily ORDER BY date
